articles.title: 'Rubbish shot': Virat Kohli overheard sledging Smith, AUS star gives epic reply - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Before start of Day 4, former Australia coach Justin Langer witnessed what he described as a “magic moment” between Virat Kohli and Steve Smith. | Cricket
articles.content: Before the start of what was an action-packed Saturday at The Oval in the World Test Championship final which saw Australia set a colossal target of 444 runs against India before the raging debated u… [+2145 chars]
